> The diff coverage is `n/a`.

[![Impacted file tree graph](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/16575/graphs/tree.svg?src=pr&token=eZ4WkYLtcO&width=650&height=150)](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/16575?src=pr&el=tree)

==========================================

- Misses       4709     4721      +12

|---|---|---|
| [pandas/plotting/\_converter.py](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/16575?src=pr&el=tree#diff-cGFuZGFzL3Bsb3R0aW5nL19jb252ZXJ0ZXIucHk=) | `63.23% <0%> (-1.82%)` | :arrow_down: |

ahh right I remember your comment. thanks.
